title: Global climate summit reaches provisional deal
description: Leaders agree on a pathway to reduce emissions.
content: Delegates at the global climate summit in Geneva agreed on a provisional framework aimed at accelerating carbon reductions over the next decade.

title: New electric buses roll out in Madrid
description: La capital española introduce una nueva flota ecológica.
content: Madrid ha puesto en marcha 50 autobuses eléctricos para reducir la contaminación y mejorar el transporte público.

title: Berlin launches urban garden initiative
content: Die Stadt Berlin unterstützt neue urbane Gartenprojekte, um lokale Lebensmittelproduktion und grüne Räume zu fördern.

title: Tech firms collaborate on open-source AI tools
description: A consortium backs accessible AI development.
content: Several mid-sized technology companies announced a partnership to release open-source AI toolkits designed for education and small businesses.

title: Researchers discover resilient coral species
description: A breakthrough in coral reef conservation.
content: Marine biologists identified a coral species that showed unexpected resilience to warming ocean temperatures in the Pacific.

title: Nouvelles mesures pour améliorer les transports lyonnais
description: Lyon investit dans des tramways modernes.
content: La métropole de Lyon annonce un plan d'investissement de 200 millions d'euros pour moderniser son réseau de tramways d'ici 2026.

title: Tokyo startups pivot to green energy
description: Small firms target hydrogen and solar projects.
content: Dozens of Tokyo-based startups are shifting their focus to renewable energy, partnering with municipalities to deploy hydrogen fuel cells and rooftop solar systems.

title: Российские школы внедряют уроки экологии
content: В нескольких российских регионах стартовала образовательная программа по экологии, направленная на сокращение отходов и защиту лесов.

title: São Paulo expande programa de bicicletas públicas
description: Mais estações chegam aos bairros periféricos.
content: A prefeitura de São Paulo anunciou a expansão do programa de bicicletas compartilhadas para 15 novos bairros com baixa oferta de transporte.

title: Climate summit secures new adaptation fund
content: An adaptation fund worth $2 billion will back sea wall construction and mangrove restoration in Southeast Asia.

title: Innovadores colombianos desarrollan redes de sensores
description: Tecnología para monitorear la calidad del aire.
content: Un grupo de ingenieros en Bogotá desplegó sensores de bajo costo que monitorean contaminación en tiempo real para alertar a los ciudadanos.

title: 新しい洋上風力発電プロジェクトが北海道で始動
description: 地域経済と持続可能な電力を後押し。
content: 北海道の沿岸で洋上風力発電プロジェクトが開始され、地元企業が建設と保守に参加する予定だ。
